page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: tractor parts,agricultural machinery and protective clothing; Aspatria Agricultural Implement Company who construct gates and farm buildings and the Aspatria Agricultural Co-operative Society who supply cattle and chicken food, fertilizers, building and fencing materials. The other main sources of employment in Aspatria are the Dairy, which produces cheese, Sealy,which makes beds, Larma,which make clothes and a furniture factory. Employment in these industries and the surrounding agricultural industry accounts for the large number of shops that are evident in a relatively small town. Some people travel to the Rayophane factory at Wigton,which makes a transparent covering for cigarette packets.Some people travel to Silloth
